unit_ability_source_types.name: Army ability

tooltip.last_approved_text: These abilities are not bound to any one unit and can therefore be used anywhere on the battlefield.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: These abilities are not bound to any one unit and can therefore be used anywhere on the battlefield.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Banner

tooltip.last_approved_text: Banners can be carried into battle by any unit, improving their condition for the duration of the fray.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: Banners can be carried into battle by any unit, improving their condition for the duration of the fray.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Bound spell

tooltip.last_approved_text: Spells sometimes apply limited charges to items or weapons, without draining the Winds of Magic.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: Spells sometimes apply limited charges to items or weapons, without draining the Winds of Magic.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Character ability

tooltip.last_approved_text: Lords and Heroes all have abilities to aid them in their quest for supremacy on campaign and in battle.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: Lords and Heroes all have abilities to aid them in their quest for supremacy on campaign and in battle.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Faction

tooltip.last_approved_text: These abilities are intrinsic to the faction and its specific personality.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: These abilities are intrinsic to the faction and its specific personality.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Hero ability

tooltip.last_approved_text: A Hero's abilities are specific to their owner, providing temporary or permanent assistance.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: A Hero's abilities are specific to their owner, providing temporary or permanent assistance.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Item

tooltip.last_approved_text: Items with magical properties may assist their owners on the battlefield.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: Items with magical properties may assist their owners on the battlefield.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Lord ability

tooltip.last_approved_text: A Lord's abilities are specific to their owner, providing temporary or permanent assistance.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: A Lord's abilities are specific to their owner, providing temporary or permanent assistance.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Lore attribute

tooltip.last_approved_text: The foundation of any spell connected to a magical Lore, attributes offer wide-reaching and constant effects.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: The foundation of any spell connected to a magical Lore, attributes offer wide-reaching and constant effects.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Mark of Chaos

tooltip.last_approved_text: When the Ruinous Powers smile upon their servants, those marks - and their beneficial effects - are borne for the duration of the battle.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: When the Ruinous Powers smile upon their servants, those marks - and their beneficial effects - are borne for the duration of the battle.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Mount ability

tooltip.last_approved_text: A mount's abilities are a core part of its being and, used wisely, can mark the difference between victory and defeat.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: A mount's abilities are a core part of its being and, used wisely, can mark the difference between victory and defeat.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Quest ability

tooltip.last_approved_text: Unique and bizarre abilities that can only be found at the mysterious locations where quest battles are fought.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: Unique and bizarre abilities that can only be found at the mysterious locations where quest battles are fought.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Rune

tooltip.last_approved_text: A varied and powerful ability type, often concerned with defence.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: A varied and powerful ability type, often concerned with defence.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Spell

tooltip.last_approved_text: Spells are summoned from the Winds of Magic, taking time and energy to conjure, and always directed outwards - never on the magic-user themself.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: Spells are summoned from the Winds of Magic, taking time and energy to conjure, and always directed outwards - never on the magic-user themself.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Unit ability

tooltip.last_approved_text: An ability is as much a part of its owning units as arms or legs, and can mark the difference between victory and defeat.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: An ability is as much a part of its owning units as arms or legs, and can mark the difference between victory and defeat.

unit_ability_source_types.name: Weapon

tooltip.last_approved_text: Weapons can do so much more than hack and slash - some are imbued with magical properties to further aid their bearers.

unit_ability_source_types.tooltip: Weapons can do so much more than hack and slash - some are imbued with magical properties to further aid their bearers.
